boat.name: Mareea
boat.full_description:
The owner and builder of this Salcombe Trader purchased the GRP hull, moulded by Buccaneer Boats, and then designed and fitted her out to a high specification. This cabinet maker builder completed the craft aongside his regular work and launched her in 2010.

Mareea was moored in Fowey Harbour and cruises extensively on the SW coast of England, with regular trips to Scilly and occasionally to Ireland. She has entered the Plymouth and Fowey Classics as well as the inaugural Isles of Scilly Classic Yacht Regatta.

With her new owner she is now moored in Guernsey.
boat.short_description: The first owner bought the hull of a Salcombe Trader from Buccaneer Boats, and fitted her out himself.

for_sales.sales_text:
A Salcombe Trader, 27ft Gaff cutter with auxiliary, Beta Marine 29hp, diesel engine. A top quality traditional cruising vessel with character,  a very capable passage maker. She has a `Classic/ Traditional’ look with the advantage of a GRP hull and stainless steel fittings. Long keel encapsulated internal ballast. Professionally built hull, totally fitted out and finished by her professional cabinet maker owner. Using top grade materials, fixtures and fittings. 5 berths. Navigation paper charts, Yeoman Plotter. Electonic charts, USB connection to laptop included in sale. Launched in 2010. 

Survey and 3 Boat magazine article reprints available on request.

Now laid up for the winter but available for viewing by appointment
